imp.core.model.loop

Class LoopFinder

  • java.lang.Object
    • imp.core.model.loop.LoopFinder

  • public class LoopFinder
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to find the kinematic loops.
    Version:
    1.01
    Author:
    workmanjz

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LoopFinder(Model model)
      Creates a new loop finder on the given model.

    • Method Summary

      • LoopFinder

        public LoopFinder(Model model)

    • Method Detail

      • findKinematicLoops

        public java.util.List<Loop> findKinematicLoops()
                                        throws LoopException,
                                               BodyNotFoundException
        This method finds all kinematic loops for the current model.
        Returns:
        A list of loop objects.
        Throws:
        LoopException - Thrown when a body or joint is not found in the loop.
        BodyNotFoundException - Thrown if a body is not found in the model.
